value:
$WmMPID_愛の祭セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Valentine19,Face|Hurry up, Ike! The festival
tournament is about to begin!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|How exactly are we expected to fight
in these outfits?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ミスト,ch09_03_Mist_F_Valentine19,Face|Faster, Ike! We'll be disqualified if we
don't get there soon!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|These clothes just don't feel right—
and this weapon has to be some kind
of joke...but I'm not laughing.$k$pThat's it. I'm using my usual gear.
And I'm going to use the wooden
sword I used to train with Father!$k$p$Sbs2000|$WmMPID_愛の祭グレイル,ch09_10_Greil_M_Valentine19,Face|Incredible...$k$pYou have my stubborn side too?
Is there anything of mine you did not
inherit, Ike?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|F-Father?!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ティアマト,ch09_04_Tiamat_F_Valentine19,Face|Commander Greil!$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_MAP_FE09_04,0|$WmMPID_愛の祭グレイル,ch09_10_Greil_M_Valentine19,Face|Hm? Something the matter? You lot
look like you've seen a ghost.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|Is it...really you, Father?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Valentine19,Face|In a world where Heroes are called
from across time and space...$k$pwould it be so strange for the
late Commander Greil to appear
before us?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ミスト,ch09_03_Mist_F_Valentine19,Face|...F-Father, I— I've missed you so
much!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭グレイル,ch09_10_Greil_M_Valentine19,Face|Now, now, Mist... There's no need
for tears. I'm as surprised as you that
we've met in such a strange place.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|Are you...here to take part in the
tournament as well, Father?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭グレイル,ch09_10_Greil_M_Valentine19,Face|I am—and I see that you are as well.
Time to show me how much you've
improved since last we met!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|...Of course.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_愛の祭ミスト,ch09_03_Mist_F_Valentine19,Face|A tournament, huh? Men are so easily
entertained...$k$pOh well. While they're all distracted,
I'll have plenty of time to prepare
their Day of Devotion gifts!$k$pThis one's for Ike, and...this one's
for Father...$k$pOh! Titania, this one's for you!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ティアマト,ch09_04_Tiamat_F_Valentine19,Face|How delightful! Thank you.$k$pOh, Mist, what do you think
about this cloak? Would it suit
Commander Greil?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_愛の祭ティアマト,ch09_04_Tiamat_F_Valentine19,Face|We're safer all together! Let's find
and reunite with Ike and Commander
Greil—quickly!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ミスト,ch09_03_Mist_F_Valentine19,Face|Right, but... I, um... I haven't finished
shopping for gifts yet!$k$p$Sbs150|
